Parameters: List: The most recently updated list of available file services.
onFileServicesUpdated(java.util.List<and.Description: Called to indicate published File Services have changed. This will only be called after the application has requested a list of file services and specified a service class list of interest via @B_android#telephony#MbmsDownloadSession#requestUpdateFileServices_E@. If there are subsequent calls to @B_android#telephony#MbmsDownloadSession#requestUpdateFileServices_E@, this method may not be called again if the list of service classes would remain the same.

onMiddlewareReady().Description: Called to indicate that the middleware has been initialized and is ready. Before this method is called, calling any method on an instance of @B_android#telephony#MbmsDownloadSession_E@ will result in an @B_java#lang#IllegalStateException_E@ being thrown or @B_android#telephony#mbms#MbmsDownloadSessionCallback#onError_E@ being called with error code @B_android#telephony#mbms#MbmsErrors#GeneralErrors#ERROR_MIDDLEWARE_NOT_YET_READY_E@

Parameters: int: Any error code listed in @B_android#telephony#mbms#MbmsErrors_E@
String: A message, intended for debugging purposes, describing the error in further detail.
onError(int, java.lang.String).Description: Indicates that the middleware has encountered an asynchronous error.
onError(int, java.lang.String).FullName: public void onError (int errorCode, String message)

Parameters: int: Any error code listed in @B_android#telephony#mbms#MbmsErrors_E@ Value is @B_android#telephony#mbms#MbmsErrors#ERROR_NO_UNIQUE_MIDDLEWARE_E@, @B_android#telephony#mbms#MbmsErrors#ERROR_MIDDLEWARE_LOST_E@, @B_android#telephony#mbms#MbmsErrors#ERROR_MIDDLEWARE_NOT_BOUND_E@, @B_android#telephony#mbms#MbmsErrors#InitializationErrors#ERROR_APP_PERMISSIONS_NOT_GRANTED_E@, @B_android#telephony#mbms#MbmsErrors#InitializationErrors#ERROR_DUPLICATE_INITIALIZE_E@, @B_android#telephony#mbms#MbmsErrors#InitializationErrors#ERROR_UNABLE_TO_INITIALIZE_E@, @B_android#telephony#mbms#MbmsErrors#GeneralErrors#ERROR_MIDDLEWARE_NOT_YET_READY_E@, @B_android#telephony#mbms#MbmsErrors#GeneralErrors#ERROR_OUT_OF_MEMORY_E@, @B_android#telephony#mbms#MbmsErrors#GeneralErrors#ERROR_MIDDLEWARE_TEMPORARILY_UNAVAILABLE_E@, @B_android#telephony#mbms#MbmsErrors#GeneralErrors#ERROR_IN_E911_E@, @B_android#telephony#mbms#MbmsErrors#GeneralErrors#ERROR_NOT_CONNECTED_TO_HOME_CARRIER_LTE_E@, @B_android#telephony#mbms#MbmsErrors#GeneralErrors#ERROR_UNABLE_TO_READ_SIM_E@, @B_android#telephony#mbms#MbmsErrors#GeneralErrors#ERROR_CARRIER_CHANGE_NOT_ALLOWED_E@, @B_android#telephony#mbms#MbmsErrors#DownloadErrors#ERROR_CANNOT_CHANGE_TEMP_FILE_ROOT_E@, @B_android#telephony#mbms#MbmsErrors#DownloadErrors#ERROR_UNKNOWN_DOWNLOAD_REQUEST_E@, or @B_android#telephony#mbms#MbmsErrors#DownloadErrors#ERROR_UNKNOWN_FILE_INFO_E@

ClassDesc: A callback class that apps should use to receive information on file downloads over cell-broadcast.
